ComicInfo.Title: Homefront, Part 5 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary: HOMEFRONT reaches its explosive conclusion-and we do mean explosive: If BARONESS can't hold the city of Warrenton, no one will! And the fate of the entire G.I. JOE team rests in the hands of its newest-and most inexperienced- member, HASHTAG. What will she decide? Plus: The return of a fan-favorite Cobra character YOU'VE been clamoring for since he first appeared!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 13:21:59. [CVDB411850]
ComicInfo.Inker: Allen Martinez, Juan Castro, Marc Deering
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Allen Martinez, Joana Lafuente, Juan Doe, Robert Atkins, Ryan Dunlavey, Simon Gough, Steve Kurth
ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness, Cover Girl, Croc Master, Doc, Duke, Hashtag, Hawk, Krake, Mad Monk, Quick-Kick, Roadblock, Scrap-Iron, Shipwreck, Tunnel Rat, Wild Bill
ComicInfo.Locations: Fort Jay, Manhattan, New York State, Ohio, The Pentagon, Virginia
